Package siminov.connect.connection

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionHelper
    It provides Utility APIs for the communication
    ConnectionManager
    It exposes API to manager connection
    ConnectionRequest
    It is a POJO class, which contains information for the service request
    ConnectionResponse  
    ConnectionStatusCodes  
    HttpConnectionWorker
    It implements IConnection to handle HTTP requests
    HttpsConnectionWorker
    It implements IConnection to handle HTTPS requests
